name: Association for Art History
legal: Charity registered in England and Wales
goal:
The mission of the Association for Art History is to promote the professional practice and public understanding of art history.

Our aims are to:
• promote, represent and advocate for art history
• make art history accessible
• promote and publish art-historical research
• engage our members
• support and train art historians for the future
interests: Culture, Education and training, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Impact of EU copyright legislation on art history research and education. Impact of EU policies on access to cultural education.
